title.narrative: CAPACITY OF SCHOOL PRINCIPALS / TEACHERS

description.narrative: By 2019, school principals and teachers are equipped to provide, in interaction with the community, quality education that enhances the natural environment, knowledge and local positive cultural values, and social cohesion., which contributes to Access To Quality Learning Opportunities, Climate Change, Disaster Risks And Envionmental Degradation, Early Childhood Development, Equitable Access To Quality Education, Learning Outcomes, Learning, Skills, Participation And Engagement. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Community Engagement, Social And Behaviour Change, Data, Research, Evaluation And Knowledge Management, Developing And Leveraging Resources And Partnerships, Evaluations, Research And Data, Fostering Innovation And Use Of New Technologies, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building, Systems Strengthening To Leave No One Behind. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2022,children aged 3-15 years, girls and boys, are in a supportive environment and benefit from inclusive quality education that integrates local distinctiveness

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By 2019, school principals and teachers are equipped to provide, in interaction with the community, quality education that enhancesthe natural environment, knowledge and local positive cultural values, and social cohesion.

description.narrative: Les capacités des directeurs d’école, Délégués Scolaires de l’Enseignement Élémentaire (DSEE) et chefs d’établissement ont été renforcées en vue d’améliorer la gestion administrative et pédagogique 20 commues de convergence. Les enseignants, à leurs tours, ont bénéficié d’un encadrement pédagogique approprié pour améliorer leurs pratiques de classes en acquérant des nouvelles connaissances relatives aux contenus et à la didactique d’enseignement. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:19/01/2021
